content: owl owl owl ~ mini owl charm free pattern created by dd s crochet ^_^ materials using #4 worsted yarn color pink light pink white and black you will need some stuffing 3 5mm hook and tapestry needle etc magic_ring = magic_ring single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch chain = chain increase = increase/crochet 2 single_crochet in one stitch decrease = decrease/crochet 1 single_crochet over two stitches half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet stuff = put poly-filling inside the body starting bottom up 1 mr6 or chain 2 and make 6 single_crochet into 1st chain （6 2 do *increase* 6 times 12 3 do *1sc increase* 6 times 18 4 do *1sc 1sc increase* 6 times 24 5 ~ 8 make 1sc in each stitch around 24 9 do *1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc decrease* 4 times 20 10 ~（13） make 1sc in each stitch around 20 fasten_off and leave a long tail *** put the stuffing inside the body *** use the remaining yarn to sew top while pressing it flat then tie a knot and hide the yarn and the sewing part will become owl s hair top eyes make 2 1 mr4 or chain 2 and make 4 single_crochet into 1st chain （4 2 do *increase* 4 times 8 slip_stitch fasten_off and with long tail sew on the owl use a black yarn to embroidery the eyes wings make 2 mr6 or chain 2 and make 6 single_crochet into 1st chain （6 slip_stitch finish off and sew to side of body finally use pink yarn to embroidery the mouth between two eyes and you are done you could also sew on a spring ring or lanyard as you like
